A response to those asking about subtitles.  Of the later episodes I've checked so far, yes, they have subtitles, but they are soft-coded, not hard-coded.  In other words, you can switch them off in your media player, or you can resave the file with MKVMerge if you want to remove them completely.

Either way, don't be put off - these are typically good rips from YIFY.  If you know his stuff, you'll know the score.  Good quality as always.
